instrument: Decree Nº 177 of 01/02/1936. D.O. Nº 4 volume 120 of 01/06/1936
description: Basic law of electricity systems

instrument: Executive Decree of 10/03/1945. D.O. Nº 219 volume 139 of 10/08/1945
description: Creates the Comisión Ejecutiva Hidroeléctrica del Río Lempa (CEL)

instrument: Legislative Decree Nº 137 of 09/18/1948. O.G Nº 210 volume 145 of 09/27/1948
description: Law of the Comisión Ejecutiva Hidroeléctrica del Río Lempa (CEL)

instrument: Decree Nº 169 of 11/30/1970. D.O. Nº 235 volume 229 of 12/23/1970
description: Regulates the storage, transport, and distribution of petroleum products

instrument: Decree Nº 626 of 03/17/1981. D.O. Nº 52 volume 270 of 03/17/1981
description: Hydrocarbon Law

instrument: Signature of the Chapultepec Accord on 01/16/1992
description: End of the civil war and beginning of the economic liberalization programs

instrument: Decree Nº 808 of 09/19/1996. D.O. Nº 189 volume 33 of 10/09/1996
description: Creates the Superintendencia de Electricidad y Telecomunicaciones (SIGET)

instrument: Decree Nº 843 of 10/21/1996. D.O. Nº 201 volume 333 of 10/25/1996
description: General electricity law (GEL)
Creates the company Unidad de Transacciones (UT)

instrument: Decree Nº 354 of 07/20/1998. D.O. Nº 142 volume 340 of 07/29/1998
description: Creates the Fondo de Inversiones en Electricidad y Telecomunicaciones (FINET)
Privatizes CEL's thermal power plants to Duke Energy
Creates Geotérmica Salvadoreña (LaGeo)
Creates the Empresa de Electricidad de El Salvador (ETESAL)

instrument: Executive Decree Nº 90 of 10/24/2000. D.O. of 11/01/2000
description: Approves the norms that allow the free commercialization of electricity
Creates the Dirección de Energía Eléctrica at the Ministerio de Economía
Enel Green Power, a privately owned Italian company, buys assets in LaGeo

instrument: Legislative Decree Nº 1216 of 04/11/2003. D.O. Nº 83 volume 359 of 05/09/2003
description: Reforms GEL

instrument: Agreement Nº 616 of 07/15/2003. D.O. Nº 131 volume 360 of 07/16/2003
description: Liberalizes prices for all oil products except for LPG

instrument: Decree Nº 528 of 12/22/2004. D.O. Nº 240 volume 365 of 12/23/2004
description: Reduces SIGET's responsibilites related to anticompetitive practices

instrument: Legislative Decree Nº 404 of 08/30/2007. D.O. Nº 181 volume 377 of 01/10/2007
description: Creates the Consejo Nacional de Energía (CNE)

instrument: Legislative Decree Nº 462 of 11/08/2007. D.O. Nº 462 volume 377 of 12/20/2007
description: Tax incentive law to promote renewable energy

instrument: Decree Nº 630 of 05/22/2008. D.O. Nº 115 volume 379 of 06/20/2008
description: Governs the natural gas market
